title: 85/218/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 March 1985 withdrawing the status of certain parts of the territory of the Federal Republic of Germany with regard to classical swine fever
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 20 March 1985
withdrawing the status of certain parts of the territory of the Federal Republic of Germany with regard to classical swine fever
(85/218/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The status of those parts of the territory of the Federal Republic of Germany as areas recognized to be officially swine-fever-free within the meaning of Article 4c (1) (c) of Directive 64/432/EEC is withdrawn for the region listed in the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 March 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 1977/64.
(2) OJ No L 339, 27. 12. 1984, p. 30.
(3) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 24.
(4) OJ No L 339, 27. 12. 1984, p. 27.
(5) OJ No L 352, 14. 12. 1982, p. 27.
(6) OJ No L 63, 2. 3. 1985, p. 21.
(7) OJ No L 67, 7. 3. 1985, p. 42.
ANNEX
Regions in the Federal Republic of Germany for which the officially swine-fever-free status is withdrawn:
Regierungsbezirke: Detmold, Lueneburg and Hanover.
